component.name: Spin Wheel
component.summary: [EN] Spin the wheel. To see what will be selected! [中文] 轉動輪盤，看會選到什麼！

description.p: [EN] This app helps you to randomly select one from multiple items. You can create your own wheels with multiple selections. This app supports English and Chinese.
[中文] 這款 app 幫你隨機選擇從多個選項選出一個。你可以建立自己的多選項輪盤。這 app 支援英文與中文。

ul.li: [EN] Update Electron to v26. [中文] 更新 Electron 至 v26。
[EN] Electron app supports English / Chinese switching. [中文] Electron app 支援中文/英文切換。
[EN] Support English / Chinese switching. [中文] 支援中文/英文切換。
